mapper.insert: insert into agreement_tache(agreement_id, tache_id, user_id, delete_state) values(#{agreementId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tacheId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 0)
mapper.select: select a.id, a.agreement_id, a.tache_id, a.user_id, b.USER_NAME, c.tache_name from agreement_tache a left JOIN sys_users b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join task_tache c on c.tache_id = a.tache_id where a.agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
